means: <史>哈里发（伊斯兰领袖的称号）

sentence.Network_en: The old beggar threw himself at the Caliph's feet.
sentence.Network_cn: 老乞丐扑倒在哈里发的脚下.

sentence.Network_en: The caliph of Bagdad flew on his magic carpet to Arabia.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴格达的国王驾着魔毯飞到了阿拉伯半岛.

sentence.Network_en: Yet again the caliph must show you how to fight?
sentence.Network_cn: 又要让哈里发演示该如何战斗?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 哈里发（caliph）是伊斯兰教国家政教领袖的尊称 a successor of Muhammad as temporal and spiritual head of Islam ― used as a title
...，叙利亚总督穆阿维叶(Muawiya)创立了阿拉伯哈里发王朝(Caliph)，自8世纪初，历代哈里发在叙利亚沙漠西侧共建造了30多座大大 …

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... caliph 哈里发 caliphate 伊斯兰王权 calisaya 树皮.
哈里发帝国哈里发帝国 （Caliphate）哈里发帝国是先知穆罕默德于西元632年死后的几个世纪内由整个伊斯兰社会和穆斯林统治的土 …
另一方面，随著倭马亚王朝(Umayyad Caliphate)王朝于661的建立，回教帝国的首都亦由麦地那迁至大马士革(Damascus)。拜占庭与 …
最后，他退隐到麦地那。在他退隐后，穆阿维叶成为统治伊斯兰帝国的哈理发，开始逊尼教派的伍麦叶哈理发皇朝（Umayyad Calipha…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French caliphe, from Arabic ḵalīfa meaning 'deputy (of God') (from the title ḵalīfat Allāh), or meaning 'successor (of Muhammad') (from the title ḵalīfat rasūl Allāh 'of the Messenger of God'), from ḵalamfa 'succeed'

entry.def: A Caliph was a Muslim ruler.

means.word_mean: 1. the civil and religious leader of a Muslim state considered to be a representative of Allah on earth;

sentences.sentence: "many radical Muslims believe a Khalifah will unite all Islamic lands and people and subjugate the rest of the world"
